name: Yohan Jo
content: Lab Members Yohan Jo Assistant Professor Graduate School of Data ScienceSeoul National University yohan.jo@snu.ac.kr Lab: Research | ✔️ Members Our lab values technical depth enriched by diverse perspectives across engineering, social sciences, and the humanities. Together, we pursue a shared goal of advancing AI for human agency through both technical and interdisciplinary approaches.
